attributes.short_header: Due to the Simon Company's Copley Place construction, Back Bay Stations Dartmouth St underpass will be closed Sun, Mar 6, through Dec 2016
attributes.header: Due to the Simon Company's Copley Place construction, Back Bay Stations Dartmouth Street underpass will be closed Sunday, March 6, through December 2016.
attributes.description:
Due to Copley Place construction being performed by the Simon Company, the Dartmouth Street underpass  leading to and from the west side of Dartmouth Street at Back Bay Station will be temporarily closed from beginning Sunday, March 6, through December 2016. 

Customers are encouraged to use the stations main entrance on the east side of Dartmouth Street during the underpasss closure. 

Affected routes:
Orange Line
Framingham/Worcester Line
Needham Line
Franklin Line
Providence/Stoughton Line

attributes.short_header: Courthouse Station's south entrance/exit will be closed until fall 2016 due to the Yotel Hotel Development.
attributes.service_effect: Silver Line - SL1 and Silver Line - SL2 notice
attributes.header: Courthouse Station's south entrance/exit will be closed until fall 2016 due to the Yotel Hotel Development.
attributes.description:
Due to the construction of the Yotel Hotel Development, the south entrance/exit at Courthouse Station will be closed from Monday, October 5, 2015, until fall 2016. To exit/enter the station, please use the north entrance across the street. 

Also please note that Courthouse Elevator 939 will be unavailable during this time. Customers desiring elevator access should use Courthouse Elevator 940 to exit/enter Courthouse. This elevator is located on the opposite side of the lobby. At the street, cross Seaport Boulevard to use Courthouse Elevator 940.

attributes.short_header: Buses replacing Orange Line service between Wellington and Oak Grove Stations on September 17-18 from start to end of service.
attributes.header: Buses replacing Orange Line service between Wellington and Oak Grove Stations on September 17-18 from start to end of service.
attributes.description:
Due to the MassDOT Woods Memorial Project, buses will replace Orange Line trains between Wellington and Oak Grove Stations in both directions from start to end of service on Saturday, September 17, 2016, and Sunday, September 18, 2016.

Regular Orange Line train service will resume at the start of service on Monday, September 19, 2016. All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities. 

Shuttling the following stops: 
Oak Grove 
Malden Center
Wellington

attributes.short_header: Downtown Crossing: The Franklin St entrance will remain closed until Summer 2016 due to construction for the Millennium Tower Project
attributes.header: Downtown Crossing: The Franklin St entrance will remain closed until Summer 2016 to accommodate ongoing construction for the Millennium Tower Project.
attributes.description:
Customers desiring to enter and exit at Downtown Crossing should instead utilize entrances and exits on Summer, Chauncy, and Arch Streets. 

Customers desiring elevator access should note that Elevator 891 will be closed during this construction. If exiting, travel down the concourse to use the elevator through the glass doors and to the left of the CharlieCard Store. This elevator will take you to the lobby of 101 Arch Street. If boarding, travel to 101 Arch Street. Take the elevator in the back left corner of the lobby to the concourse. Take a right to find the Oak Grove-bound platform ahead. Customers can also enter and exit the station using the Roche Bros. elevator on Summer St. (during store hours only).

Affected routes:
Orange Line
Red Line (Ashmont branch)
Red Line (Braintree branch)

attributes.short_header: Route 73 inbound stops at Belmont St @ Templeton Pkwy and Belmont St @ Brimmer St will be permanently closed beginning Saturday, September 3
attributes.header: Route 73 inbound stops at Belmont Street @ Templeton Parkway and Belmont Street @ Brimmer Street will be permanently closed beginning Saturday, September 3
attributes.description:
The following bus stops will be closed, as a result of the MBTA Key Bus Route Improvement Program and the construction on Trapelo Road and Belmont Street:
Inbound stop #2114 at Belmont Street @ Templeton Parkway will be closed. Please use stops opposite Woodleigh Road or at Prentiss Street. 
Inbound stop #21171 at Belmont Street @ Brimmer Street will be closed. Please use stops at Prentiss Street or at St. Marys Street.

attributes.short_header: Beginning Thursday, September 1, the CharlieCard Store will be open Monday-Friday, 8:30 am to 5:00 pm and will have a new transaction policy
attributes.service_effect: Boat, Bus, Commuter Rail and Subway notice
attributes.header: Beginning Thursday, September 1, the CharlieCard Store will be open Monday-Friday, 8:30 am to 5:00 pm and will have a new transaction policy.
attributes.description:
The CharlieCard Store is making two important changes to increase our efficiency and help us deliver better service to our customers. These changes will take effect on Thursday, September 1, 2016. 

New Store Hours: Monday - Friday, 8:30 am - 5:00 pm 

New Transaction Policy: The CharlieCard Store will no longer process transactions that can be completed at a fare vending machine.
